name: Mask of Marvels
description:
Mask of Marvels is a short action-platform game made in Godot. Guide your hero through twelve exciting levels across four different environments and unleash the power of the Mask. Defeat a varied set of enemies and conquer treacherous hazards on the way to saving the land. Enjoy colorful and varied pixel art environments.

Controls:

  • A - Left
  • D - Right
  • Spacebar - Jump

Other controls are explained on screen during the game.

Approximately one hour of gameplay.
